name: Vacation
alt: Melody wearing her swimsuit, laying on a towel at the beach.
description: When given the rare day off, Melody takes full advantage.

name: Protector
alt: Melody holding an assault rifle, ready to fire.
description: One of her many duties is to ensure Naomi's safety.

name: Late Night
alt: Melody sitting in the dark working on her computer.
description: While Naomi rests, Melody remains hard at work planning the next day.

name: Maid Melody
alt: Melody wearing a sleeveless dress and jeans, holding a tray of food.
description: Her Mistress should never go hungry.

name: Motorcycle
description: A motorbike allows her to travel quickly, ensuring she can meet her Mistress' needs.

name: Reading in Bed
alt: Melody leaning back on her bed, reading a book.
description: She likes to review tomorrows plans before catching some much needed rest.

name: Researching
alt: Melody sitting at her desk, browsing her computer.
description: A good maid is always prepared.

name: Working
alt: Melody sitting at a desk, using her computer.
description: Much of her work involves planning and detail. Her computer helps her keep it organised.

name: Unwinding
alt: Melody laying in bed with her phone.
description: A few moments to unwind before some much needed sleep.

name: Carry the Weight
alt: Melody cradling Naomi in her arms.
description: Despite Naomi's embarrassment, Melody will carry her if the opportunity arises.

name: Heart Hands
alt: Naomi and Melody putting their hands together to make a heart.

name: Sneak a Nap
description: Naomi often works herself to exhaustion, so Melody frequently encourages naps.
alt: Naomi laying her head in Melody's lap, sleeping while Melody strokes her hair.

name: Uncontrolled Thoughts
alt: Melody thinking, the thought bubble showing Naomi.
description: Her thoughts might get away from her, but her Mistress is always at the forefront of her mind.
